mapper.select: select * from payment where id = #{id} and is_deleted = 0
select id from payment where pay_sn = #{paySn} and is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert: insert into payment(actual_price, pay_channel, is_successful,pay_sn, begin_time, order_id, is_deleted,gmt_create,gmt_modified,end_time) values (#{actualPrice},#{payChannel},false,#{paySn},now(),#{orderId},false,now(),now(),date_add(now(),interval 30 minute))
